description: Rapid Measurement Set plotting with xarray-ms and datashader.

parameters.info: Measurement set to plot
parameters.name: ms

parameters.info: Xaxis to plot. Can be any MS column name, also: CHAN, FREQ, CORR, ROW, WAVEL, U, V, W, UV, and, for complex columns, keywords such as: 'amp', 'phase', 'real', 'imag'. You can also specify correlations, e.g. 'DATA:phase:XX'. The order of specifiers does not matter.
parameters.name: xaxis

parameters.info: Y axis to plot. Must be given the same number of times as --xaxis.
parameters.name: yaxis

parameters.info: Intensity axis. If none, plot intensity (a.k.a. alpha channel) is proportional to density of points.Otherwise, a reduction function (--ared) is applied to the given values, and the result is used to determine intensity.
parameters.name: aaxis

parameters.info: Alpha axis reduction function.
parameters.name: ared

parameters.info: Colour axis. All columns and variations listed under --xaxis are available for colouring by.
parameters.name: colour-by

parameters.info: Name of visibility column. Default is DATA. Two-column arithmetic is recognized.
parameters.name: col

parameters.info: Ignore flagged data. Default is true.
parameters.name: noflags

parameters.info: Do not show conjugate points in u,v plots. Default is true.
parameters.name: noconj

parameters.info: Minimum x-axis value. Default is data min.
parameters.name: xmin

parameters.info: Maximum x-axis value to plot. Default is data max.
parameters.name: xmax

parameters.info: Minimum y-axis value. Default is data min.
parameters.name: ymin

parameters.info: Maximum y-axis value to plot. Default is data max.
parameters.name: ymax

parameters.info: Minimum colouring value. Default is data-min.
parameters.name: cmin

parameters.info: Maximum colouring value.  Default is data-max.
parameters.name: cmax

parameters.info: Number of colours to use.
parameters.name: cnum

parameters.info: Separate plots per field. Default is combine all.
parameters.name: iter-field

parameters.info: Separate plots per antenna. Default is combine all.
parameters.name: iter-antenna

parameters.info: Separate plots per spw. Default is combine all.
parameters.name: iter-spw

parameters.info: Separate plots per scan. Default is combine all.
parameters.name: iter-scan

parameters.info: Separate plots per correlation / Stokes. Default is combine all.
parameters.name: iter-corr

parameters.info: Antennas to plot (comma-separated list of names). Default is all.
parameters.name: ant

parameters.info: Antennas to plot (comma-separated list of numbers, or a [start]:[stop][:step] slice, overrides --ant).
parameters.name: ant-num

parameters.info: Baselines to plot, as 'ant1-ant2' (comma-separated list). Default is all.
parameters.name: baseline

parameters.info: Spectral windows (DDIDs) to plot (comma-separated list) Default is all.
parameters.name: spw

parameters.info: Field ID(s) to plot (comma-separated list). Default is all.
parameters.name: field

parameters.info: Scans to plot (comma-separated list). Default is all.
parameters.name: scan

parameters.info: Correlations or Stokes to plot, use indices or labels (comma-separated list). Default is all.
parameters.name: corr

parameters.info: Channel slice, as [start]:[stop][:step].  Default is to plot all.
parameters.name: chan

parameters.info: Canvas x-size in pixels.
parameters.name: xcanvas

parameters.info: Canvas y-size in pixels.
parameters.name: ycanvas

parameters.info: Pixel scale normalization. Default is 'log' when colouring, and 'eq_hist' when not.
parameters.name: norm

parameters.info: Colorcet map used without --colour-by.
parameters.name: cmap

parameters.info: Colorcet map used when colouring by a continuous axis.
parameters.name: bmap

parameters.info: Colorcet map used when colouring by a discrete axis.
parameters.name: dmap

parameters.info: Dynamically spread rendered pixels to this size.
parameters.name: spread-pix

parameters.info: Threshold parameter for spreading (0 to 1).
parameters.name: spread-thr

parameters.info: RGB hex code for background colour. Default FFFFFF (white).
parameters.name: bgcol

parameters.info: Font size for all text elements.
parameters.name: fontsize

parameters.info: Suffix to be included in filenames.
parameters.name: suffix

parameters.info: Output PNG name. Default is
parameters.name: png

parameters.info: Template for plot titles. Default title includes ms name, field, spw, scan, antenna, plot title, alpha title and colour title.
parameters.name: title

parameters.info: Template for X axis labels. Default is x-axis name and unit
parameters.name: xlabel

parameters.info: Template for Y axis labels. Default is y-axis name and unit
parameters.name: ylabel

parameters.info: Enable debugging output.
parameters.name: debug

parameters.info: Row chunk size for dask-ms. Larger chunks may or may not be faster, but will certainly use more RAM.
parameters.name: row-chunk-size

parameters.info: Run up to N renderers in parallel. Default is serial. Use -j0 to auto-set this to half the available cores.
parameters.name: num-parallel

parameters.info: Enable dask profiling output.
parameters.name: profile
